description: Professor of EU and Human Rights Law, Royal Holloway University of London. Next book: UK Trade Law after Brexit (OUP, forthcoming)

Emeritus Prof of Organization Studies, Royal Holloway University of London, ex-Prof Warwick & Cambridge. Now mainly analysis of Brexit (& related) including Brexit & Beyond Blog. Author Brexit Unfolded (Biteback, 2021, 2023). Elsewhere @chrisgreybrexit

Computational Cognitive Neuroscientist at Royal Holloway, University of London. Lab starting @ CiNet in Osaka (2025). Category learning to concept formation and everything in between (attention, semantic/episodic memory) in models & brains. Ageing.
